message: Let's start with a fair share, Bob. 90% for me, 10% for you. Take it or leave it.
I'll give you 40% and keep 60%. It's a fair compromise!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think 81% is a reasonable compromise. Take it or leave it.
I'll give you 45% and keep 55%. It's a fair compromise, considering the value of the money is decreasing!
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think 72.9% is a reasonable compromise. Take it or leave it.
I'll give you 50% and keep 50%. It's time to split the difference and end this game!
